content: just to clarify -- where the pattern says to repeat the previous row on all even-numbered rounds it means you are repeating the row you just worked a second time so on round 4 you ll repeat round 3 on round 6 you ll repeat round 5 and so on on round 16 repeat round 15 and then you re ready to start a new pattern repeat this easy-to-work pattern makes a plush stretchy reversible fabric perfect for a cozy cowl it s the perfect way to use a small amount of a luxurious yarn like this hand-dyed silk and wool blend if you d like to make some coordinating accessories sarah hood designer has designed the lovely darkside mitts 1 and undercoverknits person has designed an awesome matching darkside hat 2 for instructions in spanish mavivi has translated the pattern which you can find here 3 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/darksde-mitts 2 http //undercoverknits blogspot com/2010/10/darkside-hat html 3 http //mavivi blogspot com es/2012/12/traduccion-cuello-dark-side html
